вариант 夫
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: A working 夫 man 亻; 夫 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 夫 [ fū ] man, husband; worker; those
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze text from " person " from " husband ". It has the same meaning as the word " husband ", and it is interpreted as a person serving in labor, such as a car pi, a horse pi, etc. Especially used to mean people who are forced to do hard work, such as Lapi and Minpi.

People who use the word "伕" to explain labor service are more common in modern literature. Shen Congwen "Congwen Autobiography. "Chenzhou": "In order to escape the attention of these people, I followed a group of young men with poor appearances and walked behind them." "Chain appearance" refers to the appearance of a soldier. Mao Dun's "One O'clock in the Summer Night": "Every time you take a pirate temporarily, every time you have to use diplomatic skills, almost even her will feel like she can't turn around." Forcing someone to do something. In Cantonese, there is still the term "temporary pull".

Bronze inscriptions are incomplete and the intention is unknown. The new Cai Chu bamboo slips have the form from " person " to " husband ", but there are literal symbols under the characters, so they should be interpreted as "lady". The Han seal is used as the surname, "Han Yin Character Sign": "Private Seal of Pi Xian".

Commonly used as " husband ", meaning "husband". "Change and Four Tones Chapter. "Human Ministry" quoted "Chuan Pian": "Pi, wife and son-in-law."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription from " person " from " husband ". It has the same meaning as the word " husband ", and it is interpreted as a person serving in labor, such as a car pi, a horse pi, etc.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「人」從「夫」。與「夫」字意同，解為服勞役的人，如車伕、馬伕等。特別用作表示被強逼去做苦工的人，如拉伕、民伕。

　　以「伕」字解作服勞役之人多見於近代文學。沈從文《從文自傳．辰州》：「為了逃避這些人的注意，我就同幾個差弁模樣的年輕人，跟在一夥腳伕後面走去。」「差弁模樣」即軍人的模樣。茅盾 《夏夜一點鐘》：「每次臨時拉伕吧，每次得略施外交手腕，幾乎連她也會感到兜不轉身。」「兜不轉身」即無法應付；「拉伕」即是強逼人做某事。粵語仍有「臨時拉伕」這個說法。

　　金文文辭殘缺，用意不明。新蔡楚簡有從「人」從「夫」的字形，但字下有合文符號，故當釋為「夫人」二字。漢印用作姓氏，《漢印文字徵》：「伕憲私印」。

　　通作「夫」，意指「丈夫」。《改併四聲篇．人部》引《川篇》：「伕，女夫婿也。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「人」從「夫」。與「夫」字意同，解為服勞役的人，如車伕、馬伕等。

Ideographic: A working 夫 man 亻; 夫 also provides the pronunciation

金文從「 人 」從「 夫 」。與「 夫 」字意同，解為服勞役的人，如車伕、馬伕等。特別用作表示被強逼去做苦工的人，如拉伕、民伕。 以「 伕 」字解作服勞役之人多見於近代文學。沈從文《從文自傳．辰州》：「為了逃避這些人的注意，我就同幾個差弁模樣的年輕人，跟在一夥腳伕後面走去。」「差弁模樣」即軍人的模樣。茅盾 《夏夜一點鐘》：「每次臨時拉伕吧，每次得略施外交手腕，幾乎連她也會感到兜不轉身。」「兜不轉身」即無法應付；「拉伕」即是強逼人做某事。粵語仍有「臨時拉伕」這個說法。 金文文辭殘缺，用意不明。新蔡楚簡有從「 人 」從「 夫 」的字形，但字下有合文符號，故當釋為「夫人」二字。漢印用作姓氏，《漢印文字徵》：「伕憲私印」。 通作「 夫 」，意指「丈夫」。《改併四聲篇．人部》引《川篇》：「伕，女夫婿也。」
Bronze text from " person" from " husband". It has the same meaning as the word " husband", and it is interpreted as a person serving in labor, such as a car pi, a horse pi, etc. Especially used to mean people who are forced to do hard work, such as Lapi and Minpi. People who use the word " 伕" to explain labor service are more common in modern literature. Shen Congwen "Congwen Autobiography. "Chenzhou": "In order to escape the attention of these people, I followed a group of young men with poor appearances and walked behind them." "Chain appearance" refers to the appearance of a soldier. Mao Dun's "One O'clock in the Summer Night": "Every time you take a pirate temporarily, every time you have to use diplomatic skills, almost even her will feel like she can't turn around." Forcing someone to do something. In Cantonese, there is still the term "temporary pull". Bronze inscriptions are incomplete and the intention is unknown. The new Cai Chu bamboo slips have the form from " person" to " husband", but there are literal symbols under the characters, so they should be interpreted as "lady". The Han seal is used as the surname, "Han Yin Character Sign": "Private Seal of Pi Xian". Commonly used as " husband", meaning "husband". "Change and Four Tones Chapter. "Human Ministry" quoted "Chuan Pian": "Pi, wife and son-in-law."

伕字的基本解释

伕
fū
同“夫”②。一般指出苦力的人。

伕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fū］
旧时指夫役。参见“伕役”、“伕子”。

伕字的康熙字典解释

【補遺】【子集】【人字部】　伕； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页96第12
【篇海】音夫。女夫婿也。

伕字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
伕字的起名意思

一般指出苦力的人。
